text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine
"The case series so far are unimpressive or negative," Ho said of the re-purposed malaria drugs.

Ho noted hydroxychloroquine "was largely ignored by the scientific community" before it was "promulgated by our president."
https://t.co/XwKZkzcYtX
